about_the_game: The Godkiller is different than any other game you've played before. So we wanted to give you a chance to try it out for free. This demo provides the first twelve levels of the full game, which is about 10% of the overall experience. If you purchase the full game later, your Steam achievements and progress will automatically transfer to the full game. Enjoy!
detailed_description: The Godkiller is different than any other game you've played before. So we wanted to give you a chance to try it out for free. This demo provides the first twelve levels of the full game, which is about 10% of the overall experience. If you purchase the full game later, your Steam achievements and progress will automatically transfer to the full game. Enjoy!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave 10.14.6
  • Processor: Intel CPU capable of 4 or more threads
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 4000, Iris 5000 & 6000 family w/1 GB VRAM or better. Most Macs from 2012 on.
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: MacOS Mojave 10.14.6
  • Processor: Quad Core Intel
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GT 600M, 700M family / AMD R9 M family or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

name: The Godkiller - Chapter 1 Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 SP1 64 bit or newer
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 GTX w/1GB / AMD 7700 series w/1GB equivalent or better
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: A puzzle adventure from Erik Hermansen, creator of Deadly Rooms of Death. Fling yourself into 58 massive puzzle levels. Stack blocks, dodge cops, die to progress, and discover the secrets of the afterlife.
